title: Gboard Voice Dictation Not Working For Any Language Other Than English
content:
I've been using gboard voice typing for Cantonese for the past 4 years

But something wierd happened last week. Voice dictation just stopped writing Chinese

I Tried Chinese / Cantonese and Japanese

Tried re-starting, clearing cache on gboard app 

Same issue with another same exact phone (Pixel - Android version 9)

It seems whatever language I speak into, the system just recognizes it in English

Has anyone experienced something similar?

thanks
category: Google Assistant and Voice Actions, Google Pixel
